subject: Re: Order #SSN3179, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello Simsonn

I'll give my opinion once I've received my entire order.
I'm still waiting for the handbrake.
Once it's installed, I'll be able to properly test the whole system.

Cordially

Pierre

Le 23/11/2025 à 12:18, SIMSONN a écrit :
> Hello Pierre, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and 
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it 
> only takes a few 
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text:
Hello, I'd like to log in to my account using the link you sent me, but 
I don't have a password. Your website isn't sending me a link to reset 
my password. Could you please do something about this? Thank you



Le 24/11/2025 à 16:14, service@simsonn.com a écrit :
>
>
>         Hi Pierre SOWINSKI
>
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a 
> ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send 
> you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
>
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
> https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6661?follow=email
>
> Thank you for your patience.
>
> View ticket 
> <https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6661?follow=email>
> /If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's 
> address bar: 
> /https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6661?follow=email
>
> Regards,
> simsonn Support Team
>
>
> 6661:4206036

Hi Pierre SOWINSKI, ​  We apologize for the inconvenience. UPS may not have been able to contact you during delivery, so the package has been placed at a pickup location. Please contact UPS as soon as possible to arrange for pickup.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1Z144AW70405101096

Hello,

I've already received the first package, but I'm still waiting for the 
second.



As you can see from the tracking information.
https://www.sf-express.com/we/ow/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6047023888985

Regards
